By the King. A proclamation appointing the flags, aswell for our nauie royall, as for the ships of our subiects of south and north Britaine. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
[1] sheet ([1] p.).
by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill, Imprinted at London : 1634.
Dated at end: Greenewich, this fifth day of May, in the tenth yeere of our reigne ... . Arms 11; Steele notation: the other obedi-. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
